items.title: Lilavati Trust refutes HDFC Bank’s claims, accuses CEO Sashidhar Jagdishan of conspiracy and misconduct
items.description: According to an exchange filing by HDFC Bank on Sunday evening, in 2001, Splendour Gems Limited, owned by the Mehta family, defaulted on loan facilities

items.title: Warner Bros Discovery to separate studios and streaming in two-way split
items.description: The media industry is going through what some executives have called a 'general disruption' as millions of subscribers abandon the once-lucrative cable TV for streaming.

items.title: Bank of America taps JPMorgan banker to helm India equity markets business
items.description: Satish Arcot, a two-decade financial services veteran, will join the bank toward the end of the year as a Mumbai-based managing director,

items.title: Veteran Kotak fund manager Lakshmi Iyer set to join Bajaj Finserv
items.description: Bajaj Finserv, controlled by Sanjiv Bajaj, is a financial conglomerate primarily involved in retail credit such as consumer loans.

items.title: Jio BlackRock Asset Management announces executive leadership team, offers exclusive early access on website
items.description: The initiative by Jio BlackRock invites individuals to register their interest in the AMC's digital-first offering, which will offer a preview of the value proposition as well as educational content.

items.title: Is there more steam left in the markets, post monetary stimulus?
items.description: A buy on dip would work well with a focus on bottom-up stock picks

items.title: Apollo Hospitals: Annual report card ticks all the right boxes
items.description: Robust expansion plans in place with the target to add a total of about 4000 beds in the next 3-4 years
